tit.j: 今津のザゼンソウ群落

sen.j: 今津のザゼンソウ群落（いまづのざぜんそうぐんらく）は、滋賀県高島市にあるザゼンソウの群生地。
sen.e: The skunk cabbage community of Imazu is a habitat for the plant located in Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.
The skunk cabbage community of Imazu is a habitat for the plant located in Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.
The skunk cabbage community of Imazu is a habitat for the plant located in Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 国内南限のザゼンソウ自生地として知られる。
sen.e: It is known as the southernmost natural habitat for the plant in Japan.
It is known as the southernmost natural habitat for the plant in Japan.
It is known as the southernmost natural habitat for the plant in Japan.

sen.j: 饗庭野の湿地帯に高密度で広く群生する。
sen.e: Skunk cabbage grows widely and in high concentration in the wetlands of Aibano.
Skunk cabbage grows widely and in high concentration in the wetlands of Aibano.
Skunk cabbage grows widely and in high concentration in the wetlands of Aibano.

sen.j: 1981年に今津中学の生徒が理科授業の観察時に発見した。
sen.e: It was discovered in 1981 by students of Imazu Junior High School while conducting observations for their science class.
It was discovered in 1981 by students of Imazu Junior High School while conducting observations for their science class.
It was discovered in 1981 by students of Imazu Junior High School while conducting observations for their science class.

sen.j: 環境庁の自然環境保全基礎調査の特定植物群落に選定（1986年）、および滋賀県自然環境保全条例の緑地環境保全地域に指定（1989年）されている。
sen.e: It was designated Specific Plant Community under the Environment Agency's National Survey on the Natural Environment in 1986 and was named Green Preservation Zone under the Nature Conservation Regulation in Shiga Prefecture in 1989.

It was designated Specific Plant Community under the Environment Agency's National Survey on the Natural Environment in 1986 and was named Green Preservation Zone under the Nature Conservation Regulation in Shiga Prefecture in 1989.

It was designated Specific Plant Community under the Environment Agency's National Survey on the Natural Environment in 1986 and was named Green Preservation Zone under the Nature Conservation Regulation in Shiga Prefecture in 1989.

sen.j: 毎年2月下旬に周辺で「ザゼンソウまつり」が開催される。
sen.e: "Skunk Cabbage Festival" is held in the area every year in late February.
Skunk Cabbage Festival' is held in the area every year in late February.
Skunk Cabbage Festival' is held in the area every year in late February.

sen.j: 滋賀県高島市今津町弘川
sen.e: Hirokawa, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture
Hirokawa, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture
Hirokawa, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道湖西線 近江今津駅 徒歩20分
sen.e: 20 min. on foot from Omi-Imazu Station on the West Japan Railway Company Kosei Line
20 min. on foot from Omi-Imazu Station on the West Japan Railway Company Kosei Line
20 minuites on foot from Omi-Imazu Station on the West Japan Railway Company Kosei Line

sen.j: JR湖西線 近江今津駅からバスで7分、「ざぜん草前」下車、徒歩3分
sen.e: 7 min. by bus from JR Kosei Line Omi-Imazu Station and 3 min. on foot from Zazenso-mae busstop.
7 min. by bus from JR Kosei Line Omi-Imazu Station and 3 min. on foot from 'Zazenso-mae' busstop.
